title: S1 Ep28: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Bonus Addendum - Baltimore Justice
itunes:title: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Bonus Addendum - Baltimore Justice
description:
November 30, 2017 / Susan and Colin talk to Adnan’s attorney, Justin Brown, about Adnan’s case and other criminal justice developments in Baltimore.

Today’s addendum is brought to you by our newest sponsor, Omaha Steaks.

For only $49.99 you can get a Family Gift Pack wen you go to www.omahasteaks.com and enter UA in the search bar – That’s 75% off!

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
